description: LinkedIn identity provider, let you register and set up permissions and authorization options for OAuth 2.0 protocol. https://www.linkedin.com/developers/ NOTE: r_basicprofile is available only for some linkedin products

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Required. The client ID you received from LinkedIn when you registered.

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: Required. The client secret you received from LinkedIn for your LinkedIn App.

scopes.title: Scopes
scopes.description: Scopes let you specify exactly what type of access you need. Scopes limit access for OAuth tokens.

connectTimeout.title: HTTP Client connect timeout
connectTimeout.description: Duration of time in milliseconds that connects will block. (default 10000 ms)

maxPoolSize.title: HTTP Client max pool size
maxPoolSize.description: Maximum pool of connections can grow to. (default 100)
